默认示例

原生表格：

Column 1 Column 2
Row 1 Data 1 Row 1 Data 2
Row 2 Data 1 Row 2 Data 2

使用插件的表格：

Column 1 Column 2
Row 1 Data 1 Row 1 Data 2
Row 2 Data 1 Row 2 Data 2 
<table id="table_id">
  <thead>
      <tr>
          <th>Column 1</th>
          <th>Column 2</th>
      </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
      <tr>
          <td>Row 1 Data 1</td>
          <td>Row 1 Data 2</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
          <td>Row 2 Data 1</td>
          <td>Row 2 Data 2</td>
      </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

<script type="text/javascript">
require(['jq/dataTables'], function() {
  $('#table_id').dataTable();
});
</script>
